name: Lose Your Marble
description:
An insight into one’s mind in the journey toward stability. The blue skin color spiritually represents peace, something that we all seek in life.
2048x2048 px,jpg.This NFT art is hand drawn digitally using a stylus pen in the Sketchbook program on an Ipad Pro device

From That's Me series x DettyToski
In a contemplation space, what does it means to save oneself ?
It's just ironic as there's no cure. And I start reflecting on my life.
The power I can have.
The thought to escape and take control.
I'll turn your world into ash and treat you like you're the lamb
You can sit here wallowing in your ignorance.
Looking for any reason, you can deny
Because life and death decisions are once yours 
but the two sisters (words) will no longer hurt me

In this series, I portrays the contrast of bright neon colours as the struggle one’s most often has in dealing with bipolar disorder. The battle to survive the bewildering highs and lows in the brain turbulence is represented in each bold stroke
